title: BRIEF-India's Network18 Media & Investments Sept-Qtr Consol Net Loss Narrows
text:
BRIEF-India's Network18 Media & Investments Sept-Qtr Consol Net Loss Narrows

Stock Markets 12 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 13:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Network18 Media & Investments Sept-Qtr Consol Net Loss Narrows Oct 15 (Reuters) - Network18 Media & Investments Ltd : * SEPT-QUARTER CONSOL NET LOSS 589.7 MILLION RUPEES VERSUS LOSS OF 989 MILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO * SEPT-QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 11.74 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 12.37 BILLION RUPEES YEAR AGO
